summary: Mod, that give you an ability to melt your weapon and armor...
descriptionHtml:
I decided to separate some parts, so it would be clean version, new materials version and vodka as separate))

=====================
HAVE A GOOD GAME!!!
=====================
If you find something make you cheat - tell me it.

Soon, this mod would be separated to two parts, SwordMelting and resource adder.
If you whant first one - feel free to use 1.0.0 versoin. Nothing extra, just melting.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Russian and English versions got little difference (R - 1.0.3, E- 1.0.1) but they wouldn\'t be different inside.

===================
SwordMelting v.1.0.0
===================
Abilities:

- To melt iron weapon, armor, shields and bows into iron ingots.
- To melt steel weapon, armor, shields and bows into steel ingots.
- To melt dwarven weapon, armor, shields and bows into dwarven ingots.
- To melt orc weapon, armor, shields and bows into orichalcum ingots.
- To melt ebony weapon, armor, shields and bows into ebony ingots.
- To melt silver rings and amulets into silver ingots.
- To melt golden rings and amulets into golden ingots.
- To tear clothes and boots into leather.
- To make crickets. (in past copper crickets were made from copper, but with trouble it can\'t be made from copper anymore)
- To make silver sword and greatsword.

========
v.1.0.1 E
========
- Remaded craft of Elven armor and weapon.
- Changed number of requred pices of ore to make an ingots.
- Vodka and Spirt now are back.
- Some new ingots and ores (well-forgitten ones)
- Two parts of weapon could be turned at one.
- And some new stuff, blocked for now.

Jade, copper and tin could be bought from Jourlund near SkyForge.
Spirt could be bought from Belethor.
Copper ingot could be made from copper with coal.
Bronze could be made from tin and copper.
Coal could be turned from logs.
I forgot what need to platinum, bat everything could be found at Belethor\'s store in Books. It needn\'t for now.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: FaustFist
